info.+content: バブルガムクライシス

In the near future, Tokyo was left flattened as a result from a great earthquake. A new city, MegaTokyo, was then recreated due in no small part from the aid of a multi-million dollar company, Genom Corp. Genom created and mass-produced biomechanical creatures called Boomers to aid in the restoration of MegaTokyo. When the Boomers began to run out of control, the AD Police at first tried to stop them, but they proved to be far more difficult to deal with than was first imagined. Under the ever looming Boomer threat, a group of four girls from varying degrees of society banded together. Calling themselves The Knight Sabers, they were the only ones with enough firepower and resourcefullness to defend the fledgling MegaTokyo from Genom and its berserk Boomers.
#01: "Konya wa Hurricane" (今夜はハリケーン; There's a Hurricane Tonight) by Kinuko Ōmori (ep 1)
#04: "CRISIS ~ Ikari o Komete Hashire~" (クライシス 〜怒りをこめて走れ〜; Crisis ~Run with Anger~) by Yuiko Tsubokura (ep 4)
#08: "Bye Bye My Crisis" by the Knight Sabers (ep 8)
#02: "Kizudarake no Wild" (傷だらけのWild; Wild and Scarred) by Kinuko Ōmori (ep 2)
#03: "Wasurenai de" (忘れないで; Don't Forget) by Kinuko Ōmori (ep 3)
#05: "Omoide ni Dakarete" (思い出に抱かれて; Embraced by Memories) by Yuiko Tsubokura (ep 5)
"Akuma to Tenshi no Kiss" (悪魔と天使のキス; Devil and Angel's Kiss) by Knight Sabers (ep 4)
"Asu e Touchdown" (明日へタッチダウン; Touchdown to Tomorrow) by Knight Sabers (ep 3)
"Kodoku no Angel" (孤独のエンジェル; Lonely Angel) by Yuki Ueda (ep 1)
"Thrill ni Odoru Tenshi-tachi" (スリルに踊る天使たち; Thrilling Angels) by Knight Sabers (ep 2)
